column4: Howdy; is there a package for Acrobat Reader around somewhere? Whatever free alternative that's currently installed doesn't display pages correctly (in the slightest)
Well, whatever I have now isn't showing any text in half of the pdf's I'm opening
Well, https://www.justice.gov.uk/downloads/publications/statistics-and-data/hmps/noms-annual-rept-0910-addendum.pdf is showing blank pages with a few random lines and a couple of graphs
if you want Adobe's version, add the partner repo then install acroread
